EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to VinSolutions!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}:{!Account.AccountNumber}
Dear {!Account.Name} Team,
Welcome to VinSolutions! As your VinPro, I will be your personal advocate within the company. I will be providing assistance with escalated issues and to help you reach your fullest potential by helping you navigate through the system. As a VinPro, my days are typically filled with scheduled calls and meetings. In an effort to ensure you receive a timely response, please consider emailing me if I’m unavailable via phone.
Support related issues can be submitted via Email, Customer Portal or by Phone.
Email: support@vinsolutions.com
Phone: 1-800-980-7488 (Mon-Fri 8am-7pm, Sat 8am-4pm CST)
Customer Portal: The Portal is where you can create a ticket and find solutions to frequently asked questions.
In order to better assist you, please make sure you create a ticket with the support department and send me an email with the ticket number. By providing me this information, I can follow the ticket and make sure it gets resolved in a timely fashion.
I look forward to speaking with you next week. Please remember if you can't reach me by phone, you can email me. Also, if you have a support related issue, you will need to create a ticket and email me the ticket number so I can follow up on the progress. Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or concerns. Once again, Welcome to VinSolutions!
Sarah McDannel I have worked as an internet director in dealerships for over 10 years. I understand the inner workings of dealerships, and have been committed to constant success of each and every team I have been a part of. Because I have been in your shoes and been a part of a team just like yours, I know that I can work with you to ensure you have the best possible relationship with VinSolutions and hopefully you will allow me to be a valued asset to your dealership and dealership’s personnel.
Sincerely,
Sarah McDannel VinPro Southeast Region VinSolutions.com sarah.mcdannel@vinsolutions.com O: 800-980-7488 x 45807
We are always striving to improve our product and customer service. To reach this goal of excellence, we would love to hear from you! Please submit feedback of your experience, positive or negative, at VinCares@vinsolutions.com.
